EmailTemplate.subject: You're Invited: Driving Real Insights Through Data Science
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://pivotal.io/event/driving-real-insights-through-data-science/bridgewater?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=driving-real-insights-through-data-science> Tuesday, October 27, 2015 REGISTER <http://pivotal.io/event/driving-real-insights-through-data-science/bridgewater?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=driving-real-insights-through-data-science> Join top data technologists from Pivotal as they demonstrate how data science can be used to accelerate new business insights. By identifying and bridging the gaps that exist between the business and IT, organizations can thrive in this fast-changing and competitive landscape.
At this half-day event, attendees will:
- Learn how to optimize value through data science and engineering - Unlock unique new insights by integrating and analyzing data from sensors, images, genomics and more - Benefit from real-world examples â€“ including use cases, demos and customer stories related to R&D and Manufacturing WHO SHOULD ATTEND If you work in R&D or Manufacturing, this will be a particularly eye-opening event for you. The sessions will cover topics of interest to data scientists, business leaders and technical managers. Register <http://pivotal.io/event/driving-real-insights-through-data-science/bridgewater?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=driving-real-insights-through-data-science> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited.
